inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of fibromyalgia using the 2011 revised American College of Rheumatology (ACR) criteria
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other physiological or psychiatric condition which might explain cognitive impairment, stress, fatigue or depression
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: 14-year-old boy with scoliosis and back pain. No other medical conditions mentioned.
